txt.en: The time has come to challenge the Olog-hai champions of the Easterling army. If they can be convincingly defeated, the siege may be broken.
Complete 'The Battle for Erebor' on Tier 2
The time has come to challenge the Olog-hai champions of the Easterling army. If they can be convincingly defeated, the siege may be broken.
